prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that features metallic scales and a fierce expression.
I want a bipedal Pokemon with unique armor-like skin and a powerful stance.
Generate a Pokemon that combines gray and gold colors with intricate designs.
Make a powerful creature that resembles a warrior with strong arms and a determined look.
Imagine a Pokemon with a majestic appearance, showcasing elements of strength and elegance.
Design a creature with a balance of grace and toughness, marked by its shiny accents.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a fighter with a bold color scheme.
